author: Dr.Hàsh
text:
Cause you never think that the last time is the last time. 
You think there will be more. 
You think you have forever, but you don't.
❤️❤️❤️

text: You are a constant reminder of how good the world can be !!!

author: Dr.Hàsh
text: May Almighty protect people from the struggles they hide from everyone, and provide them comfort and peace ♥️

author: Dr.Hàsh
text:
When you finally found that someone who tries their hardest to be with you regardless of how difficult you are,
Stay with them. 💗

because finding someone who is willing to be with you at all costs doesn’t happen everyday.💗

And whenever it happens it’s beautiful.💗

author: Dr.Hàsh
text:
Surround yourself with people who are gentle with you,
who love to see you grow,
who are there for you mentally and spiritually.
